short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This WebRTC screen capturing extension can be used within any WebRTC library/application! Use getScreenId.js!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collabdesk allows users to collaborate online in real-time with anyone, anywhere and on any device. It provides integrated voice conferencing with HD Video, content sharing and whiteboard capabilities.
